OCR_info.question_text: $\square$ 안에 알맞은 수를 써넣으시오. (1) $ 2000 \mathrm{~mL}+1700 \mathrm{~mL}=\square \mathrm{mL}   =\square L \square \mathrm{mL} $ (2)$ 1 \mathrm{~L} 100 \mathrm{~mL}+2 \mathrm{~L} 300 \mathrm{~mL}=\square L \square \mathrm{mL} $ (3) $ 4800 \mathrm{~mL}-2300 \mathrm{~mL}=\square \mathrm{mL}   =\square L \square \mathrm{mL} $ (4) $ 4 \mathrm{~L} 600 \mathrm{~mL}-300 \mathrm{~mL}=\square L \square \mathrm{mL} $
